name: INFlight
desc: The information that describes a flight.

items.name: init(airline: INAirline, flightNumber: String, boardingTime: INDateComponentsRange?, flightDuration: INDateComponentsRange, departureAirportGate: INAirportGate, arrivalAirportGate: INAirportGate)
items.desc: Creates a new object containing information about a flight.

items.name: var airline: INAirline
items.desc: The airline on which the user is flying.

items.name: var boardingTime: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The date and time during which the flight is boarding.

items.name: var flightDuration: INDateComponentsRange
items.desc: The date and time range for the departure and arrival of the flight.

items.name: var departureAirportGate: INAirportGate
items.desc: The gate from which the flight departs.

items.name: var arrivalAirportGate: INAirportGate
items.desc: The gate at which the flight arrives
